titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of carbides.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/1/2000--Introduced. Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of carbides containing any merchandise which, at the time of its entry or release from warehouse for consumption, had been classified under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States.
